name: teng_project
description: Interective English learning app with interective tests

scripts.client:install: npm install --prefix client/admin && npm install --prefix client/user
scripts.client:build: npm run build --prefix client/admin && npm run build --prefix client/user
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"

author: Ruslan Bagautdinov <bagautdinovwruslan@gmail.com>
